name: Sahil Kapoor
headerTaglineTwo: I'm Sahil Kapoor - a Full Stack

services.title: Web Development
services.description: Custom web applications built with cutting-edge technologies. We create responsive, scalable, and high-performance solutions tailored to your business needs, ensuring seamless user experiences across all devices.

services.title: Mobile Apps
services.description: Native and cross-platform mobile applications designed for iOS and Android. We develop user-friendly, feature-rich apps that provide seamless mobile experiences and help you reach your audience on any device.

services.title: SEO & Content Creation
services.description: Enhance your website's visibility and engage your audience with expert SEO strategies and high-quality content. We help you rank higher in search results and attract more visitors to your site.

services.title: Maintenance & Support
services.description: Ongoing website maintenance, updates, security patches, and technical support services. We ensure your website remains up-to-date and secure, providing peace of mind and uninterrupted service.
